find_blue_points.prompt: Find all blue points in the grid

copy_block_to_blue_points.code:
def copy_block_to_blue_points(input_grid: np.ndarray, blue_points: List[Tuple[int, int]]) -> np.ndarray:
    output_grid = np.copy(input_grid)
    block = input_grid[:3, :3]
    for point in blue_points:
        i, j = point
        output_grid[i - 1:i + 2, j - 1:j + 2] = block
    return output_grid
copy_block_to_blue_points.prompt: Copy the 3*3 block in the left-top to all blue points, putting the blue point position inthe middle

main.code:
def main(input_grid: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    blue_points = "Find all blue points in the grid"(input_grid)
    output_grid = "Copy the 3*3 block in the left-top to all blue points, putting the blue point position inthe middle"(input_grid, blue_points)
    return output_grid
